title: New Body Count Album To Feature Dave Mustaine, Randy Blythe, Max Cavalera [News]
text:
New Body Count Album to Feature Dave Mustaine, Randy Blythe, Max Cavalera Ice-T: "It's time to go kill it and make a more aggressive album." UG editor. Music lover. Constant searcher of something interesting and unique. Posted 15 hours ago 3 
Body Count have now revealed that Max Cavalera, Dave Mustaine, and Randy Blythe will all appear on new album "Bloodlust" coming via Century Media Records. 
It came from a response to a fan question on Ice-T's Twitter profile: Yep.. Dave Mustaine, Max Cavalera & Randy Blythe are featured on the Album.. https://t.co/LJsPV7M8dk â€” ICE T (@FINALLEVEL) January 30, 2017 
An official music video for first single "No Lives Matter" is coming on February 17th, with a previously posted teaser clip available below. 
Ice-T states: "With our last album 'Manslaughter,' we tested the waters and got a great response from the fans and critics. Now it's time to go kill it and make a more aggressive album and keep the Body Count style intact." 
Dave Mustaine previously talked about Body Count: 
"I always thoughts that Body Count, while if not for everybody, I thought it was great. It's not your normal metal band. It's cool to see somebody crossing over from the hip-hop world into the metal world. 
"I think it's great to be open-minded about different people from different backgrounds."
